name: 60 Watt Edinburgh Ltd
description: 60 Watt is not an advertising this or a design that or a direct marketing something else.  It’s a communication consultancy. We don’t have a one dimensional view of how you should talk to the outside world. Instead, we advise on every aspect of a company’s communications. Not just TV, radio, press and posters but also sales promotion, direct response, recruitment and online. Not just how to communicate with your customers but also how to converse with your staff.
